definition: to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't

sentences.english: However, monetary stimulus is not an open-ended, continuous course of action, says Cavey .
sentences.chinese: 但卡維認爲，貨幣激勵措施不會無休止的持續下去。

sentences.english: The eternal question is whether this is just about sexism.
sentences.chinese: 這一永無休止的問題是，如此差距是否僅僅因爲性別。

sentences.english: Why does she inexhaustibly want to talk about the relationship?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼她無休止地討論她和他之間的關係？

sentences.english: Is the unending infliction of pain also required?
sentences.chinese: 非得施以永無休止的痛苦纔行嗎？

sentences.english: I'm tired of your perpetual nag ging .
sentences.chinese: 我對你無休止的嘮叨厭煩了。

sentences.english: From hip-pop to the non-stop rhythm of the city.
sentences.chinese: 從嘻哈音樂到永無休止的城市節拍。

sentences.english: Race around the clock at the Kings Cup Derby, for non stop racing action.
sentences.chinese: 在王者賽馬會這裏有永無休止的賽馬競技。

sentences.english: Is the mechanical movement in pieces of mechanical parts restless or slowed down.
sentences.chinese: 是使機械中的運動件休止或減速的機械零件。

sentences.english: Not by over reading or having endless theoretical discussions.
sentences.chinese: 不超過閱讀或有無休止的理論討論。

sentences.english: Poorly coded validation routines can result in an endless loop of frustration.
sentences.chinese: 編碼糟糕的驗證例程也會導致無休止的問題。

sentences.english: the endless grading and inputting data into spreadsheets,
sentences.chinese: 無休止地劃分等級，然後把數據輸入到電子表格裏。

sentences.english: This condition called telogen effluvium results increased hair fall.
sentences.chinese: 這種情況稱爲休止期沴結果增加頭髮下降。

sentences.english: If suddenly loses you, just like the rests inserts my heart.
sentences.chinese: 若突然失去你，猶如休止符插入了我的心。

sentences.english: When the song came to a rest, she paused for a while.
sentences.chinese: 唱到了休止符的時候，她停頓了一下。

sentences.english: Trees are the earth’s endless effort to speak to the listening heaven.
sentences.chinese: 森林是大地對諦聽的天宇無休止的傾訴。

definition: lit. the cycle comes back to the start (idiom); to move in circles/the wheel comes full circle
to go and come back/to make a return trip/backwards and forwards (e.g. of piston or pump action)/to reciprocate (of machine part)
